message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In an income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item typically represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period. This is the cost of the inventory that has been sold to customers.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" with an amount of 504930.00 on 2024-02-03

This is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '504930.00'}}
```
